treatment-md.title: Microplitis jorgehernandezi Fernandez-Triana, Whitfield, Smith, Kula, Hallwachs & Janzen, 2015, sp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: Revision of the genera Microplitis and Snellenius (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Microgastrinae) from Area de Conservacion Guanacaste, Costa Rica, with a key to all species previously described from Mesoamerica
